content: bag with towels to maintain the perpendicular to the side seam of the bag sew shape along this line this will make a little flap in the lining that looks like a triangle repeat for when dry use matching thread to sew the flap the other side to the center back of the bag place the straps 2 into the bag and sew the strap to each side fold down the 1 excess at the lining opening of the bag sew the flowers to the points 5 7 9 and press place the lining into the bag pin the 11 and 13 of the flap sew the beads to the lining in place using a hemming stitch sew center of the flowers on points 5 7 11 and 13 the lining into the bag place flap over bag sew the bead for the flower at point 9 leave enough length to allow if desired add a patch pocket to the lining the bead to slip through the center of the before sewing the side seams flower wrap thread around the thread holding the bead in place to create a center post © 2006 little river fiber arts - lauren irving this pattern is intended for your personal use and charitable donation only please do not post this pattern on anywhere else on the web or claim it as your own please feel free to link to this site the items you make belong to you and you may sell them at craft fairs as long as you give me credit as the designer please ask permission before selling online selling in mass to retail or wholesale stores is prohibited contact me with questions at laureni526 at yahoo dot com
